description: This file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter app, responsible for displaying a list of recipes fetched from a repository, with UI elements like an app bar, banners, recipe cards, and a progress indicator.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of recipes with pull-to-refresh functionality.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen, managing loading recipes and handling UI rendering.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Fetches all recipes from the repository and updates the state.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state and triggers recipes loading.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the home screen, including app bar, banners, recipe list, and tips.
